articles.author: Steven Lynch
articles.title: Has any other player started his career with as many international wins as Deepak Hooda's 17? - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: And how often has a team lost an ODI despite a hundred and a five-for?
articles.content: Deepak Hooda's streak of 17 wins was ended by Pakistan's defeat of India in the Super 4 round of the Asia Cup  •  AFP/Getty Images
